description:
Medium forcing (ScenarioMIP SSP2-45) future scenario (2015-2050) atmosphere only simulations at high and standard resolution, with an option to continue to 2100.
For optimal comparison between models aerosol concentrations would be preferable and not emissions.
At least one ensemble member at high resolution, minimum atmosphere 25-50 km at mid-latitudes.
At least one ensemble member at standard model resolution.
rationale: Extension to the HighResMIP Historical AMIP simulations.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the mid 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2049  35yrs

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2099 85yrs

requirements.description: Extension of the HadISST SST and sea ice dataset to 2050
requirements.keywords: HadISST extension, 21st century, sea surface temperature, sea ice
requirements.label: HadISSTextension

requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5, future, 21st century, SSP2, RCP4.5
requirements.label: RCP45Forcing

requirements.description: At least two simulations, one at high resolution (minimum 25-50 km at mid-latitudes), and one at the standard model resolution
requirements.keywords: high resolution, standard resolution, at least two members
requirements.label: HighAndStandardResolution

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
